ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67796-3" EMS Disposition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Disposition"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSNumberOfPatientsRelationship
This eMSNumberOfPatientsRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67547-0" EMS Number of patients (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSIncidentDispositionRelationship
This eMSIncidentDispositionRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67548-8" EMS incident disposition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet IncidentOutcome 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.64 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSTransportMethodRelationship
This eMSTransportMethodRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67549-6" EMS transport method (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.65 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSTransportModeRelationship
This eMSTransportModeRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67550-4" EMS transport mode (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportMode 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.66 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSPatientConditionChangeAtDestinatinoRelationship
This eMSPatientConditionChangeAtDestinatinoRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67551-2" EMS patient condition change at destination (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSReasonForChoosingDestinationRelationship
This eMSReasonForChoosingDestinationRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67552-0" EMS reason for choosing destination (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet DestinationChoiceReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.68 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSPrearrivalActivationRelationship
This eMSPrearrivalActivationRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69462-0" EMS prearrival activation performed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
This observation SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.25 Required if value is TRUE
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67796-3" EMS Disposition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Disposition"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DRIV"
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived CDA Section Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSNumberOfPatientsRelationship
This eMSNumberOfPatientsRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67547-0" EMS Number of patients (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSIncidentDispositionRelationship
This eMSIncidentDispositionRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67548-8" EMS incident disposition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet IncidentOutcome 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.64 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSTransportMethodRelationship
This eMSTransportMethodRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67549-6" EMS transport method (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.65 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSTransportModeRelationship
This eMSTransportModeRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67550-4" EMS transport mode (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportMode 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.66 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSPatientConditionChangeAtDestinatinoRelationship
This eMSPatientConditionChangeAtDestinatinoRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67551-2" EMS patient condition change at destination (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSReasonForChoosingDestinationRelationship
This eMSReasonForChoosingDestinationRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67552-0" EMS reason for choosing destination (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet DestinationChoiceReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.68 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSPrearrivalActivationRelationship
This eMSPrearrivalActivationRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69462-0" EMS prearrival activation performed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
This observation SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.25 Required if value is TRUE
